title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Teacher Professional Development Program Based on the 4C/ID Model: Language

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can apply the 4C/ID model’s four stages (learning needs analysis, instructional task design, supportive learning environment design, and performance environment design) to create a language lesson design document.
Learners can apply core language teaching methodologies with ≥80% accuracy using microlearning content (5-minute segments) in mobile environments.
Learners can provide ≥3 specific feedback elements on peer teachers’ lesson designs through peer review and formative assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
